{{also|妹纸}}
==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=妹纸}}

===Etymology===
From {{zh-l|妹子|younger sister, young female}}, with replacement of the diminutive suffix {{zh-l|子|child, son}} by the close-sounding retroflexed counterpart {{zh-l|紙|paper}}. See also {{zh-l|孩紙|child, kid}}.
